Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Had a great girls getaway im Amsterdam.  We wanted a steakhouse and Maximus steakhouse did not disappoint. Great food...great atmosphere...great ambience....great employees. The best spare ribs we have ever had. My girls and I highly recommend.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: The food is really good. Sirloin Steak medium rare, rib eye medium well and lamp chop well done. All are really delicious. Service is great by the staffs. Friendly, helpful and nice.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text:
We visited the maximus steakhouse after seeing some of the food outside and it didn't disappoint.
The waiting staff were great, they were quick to serve us and the food was great …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Fantastic. I will Come again and again and again. The Steak was a Dream. it is served on a small table grill so that it stays Hot. Delicious

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Okay steakhouse. Steak could have been seasoned and I would have left 5 stars but cooked perfectly. Good selection of beers. Price okay for Amsterdam, staff friendly enough.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: The Spare ribs were dry and the salad on the side was not fresh. Despite of these the steaks were good but we had to pay separately for its sauce.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: mediocre food, but great friendly staff. ambience could be better.  feels too much of a tourist magnet.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Tasty Halal veal ribs lunch for EUR13 (sept 2020) served on top of burning charcoal. Nuff said.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Great food (had Spare Ribs, Steaks, Cheese Platter) and great drinks (the Mojito is on point). The personnel is very friendly and take good care of the guests. I will come back someday and eat here again.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: I liked this restaurant, very good meat and friendly service

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: The steak and ribs were cooked to our liking. The staff were friendly and attentive.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: I will never come back. We asked for Coca Cola and they served Pepsi. When we wanted to changed for water they putted in the bill Coca Cola instead of water because it was more expensive. Food didn’t taste good.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Very good and tasty and omg the meat is awesome! And the waitresses are very nice too, I’ll definitely be back!

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: We ordered 3 different kinds of steaks all of them were superb, the service was great. Highly recommended.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Very delicious. I thought they knew how to cut and cook the steak, but lacked a little marination. But overall a really good steak. I would recommend.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Great place! I recommend everyone. Lots of choice. Good food. And good prices. Friendly too!

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: The food actually tastes good, but the light (red) inside the restaurant does it impossible to see the food.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: So first and foremost... Staff are amazing.. But medium steak should be medium. .Not overcooked outside and rare inside.. Completely unhappy with the outcome of my steak.. Sent back once. .Came back after 30 seconds.. Sent back again …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: I have been coming here for 5 years. It's an amazing place near city center with reasonable prices and delicious menu. I myself have always ordered it's kalf ribs but their steaks are great too. Ribs here are halal as well and it's one of the very few places that serve it in Amsterdam. Highly recommended.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Fantastic. The best meal we had in all 8 days. It’s a shame we discovered it on our last night. The filet was spectacular. I suppose steak sauce would be a nice touch, but when you cook it perfect no sauce required.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Average mix grill. Nice meat, but price way too high for the quantity of food. I recommend it anyway

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Wonderful meal my favorite of the 3 days we spent in Amsterdam. They were wonderful the chef the waitresses and waiters they made me the most beautiful special order salad I wish I could show you a picture. George loved his steak

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: We dined here as a party of six, so I got a good idea of most of their culinary offering, including starters, mains and side dishes. Sadly, the quality of the food was generally mediocre at best, and downright shoddy at worst. I personally …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text:
I Wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy! After walking in and being sat at a table, 2 minutes later, I spotted a RAT walking around under the tables!
I cancelled my order and informed the waitress why I was leaving to get "oh ok" …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Fantastic food and service, can highly reccomend this place.❤

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Not the cleanest place, and the bathroom is shared, but the steaks are great. They also serve hamburgers even if it doesn't appear in the menus got. Staff speaks good English and is very friendly.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Outstanding steak. Nice location in Amsterdam. Good service. A bit pricey. Offers a wide range of meals. Lost a star for toilet cleanliness and table setting

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Very good food. Both the meat and the fish mixed platters were of very high quality. Also the service was good and professional.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Standard stakehouse, nothing special, not great, considering it is located just by the Hard Rock Cafe in which is probably its biggest competitor. Tried a maximus burger. Cold tomato and a not very grilled bun. Just okay, nothing out of the ordinary. Also, fries comes without complementary dip.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Amazing steakhouse with the friendliest and most polite staff ever! I came back the night after and was greeted with " Welcome back! How are you tonight?". The food and beverages was as excellent as the friendly staff and the cool …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: This place was an absolute shambles. TERRIBLE wait staff and a giant argument with the manager when his staff got an order wrong and left a member of our party waiting for food for 45 extra minutes, and blamed her afterwards. Do not recommend. Not friendly in the slightest. Also, tap water is NOT free.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Not impressed in any way. Service was really not good. We ordered tenderloin, and got something totally different. They could not spilt the bill, and the waiters did not understand proper English. I normally would not give the worst rating, but overall really not a good experience.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text:
I went there yesterday with my girlfriend and we ordered an hamburger with chips and the spareribs for her with two cokes.
The 1 star I am giving is for two reasons: one is that the spareribs were not …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Worst meal in years. Steak was smelly and could not even hide the bad smell with pepper and the sauce. Also check your bills. They Overcharged us

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: The biggest issue I had with the place was the RED lighting. You cant actually see what your food looks like. A couple of the wings we ordered were burnt and you couldn't tell. …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: I order sirloin steak with eggs. And I request my steak to be medium rare. But when I sliced my meat... Ta da! It is well done. Little bit dissappointed but it's okay because it has delicious taste! The eggs are perfect! Love it.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: The pizza is amazing cooked 8n a wood fired oven this is my second time visiting on my weekend break. Just about to try the ribs so will write another review soon.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: We waited for over 15 minutes to be served. After watching two parties get served twice by waitresses, we were still waiting, not looking at phones, not looking at menus and continued to be ignored. We are Black but am hoping that wasn't the issue but we feel it was because all the white people were tended to

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: o add to the comment, It was amazing considering this is the heart of Amsterdam filled with tourist trap food factories. …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Steak was ok. Restaurant needs a clean. My seat had what appeared to be dog or cat hair on it and there was a fly buzzing around.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: DO NOT EAT HERE!! Half way through eating our meal my boyfriend spotted a mouse running around the kitchen. When pointed out to the waiter he said it was a common problem in Amsterdam and there are mice infestations in all restaurants here. …

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: We were at maximus restaurant yesterday and had a lovely time. Could improve on attentiveness on arrival offering drinks. Our waiter from near bari in Italy was very friendly and entertaining.  Food excellent and good portions. Would recommend and would go back. Thanks cathy and Larry, London.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Steak with good, not the best but good. Took long time to come and take our orders. The outside area is very nice and the staff is friendly

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Steak not seasoned and so tasteless, also not cooked as requested. Chicken satay was fatty. We were hungry so ate our food but would not return.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Food was ok, but service was very poor. When the waitress delivered the wrong drink and we questioned it we were told "no you definitely ordered it, i won't change it"

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: One of the worst food I ever have in a very long time. For the price they charge, the meat was not even fresh and the fries were so dry ... Really disappointed.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Me and my best friend recently dined here, the food was beautiful and fresh, the waiter Mina i think was his name, was very welcoming, helpful and pleasant, lovely esteblishment only down fall was the very cold toilet or i would have given 5 * will be back again for the amazing steak 😍

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Nice place near Leidscheplein. We sat perhaps at a wrong spot where doors open and close so could feel some wind passing by but food was good. Staff very helpful. Would go there again to try some other dishes.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: As WoT General Maximus :  This is My favorite Steak House on planet Earth.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: The most delicious veal ribs Amsterdam can offer, insane amounts at a very reasonable price. Very friendly waiters and quick service.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text:
'
WORST PLACE EVER! After waiting 30 minutes for somebody to take our order, the waiter said that it is our fault that he didn't came to take the order, such rude personnel. I don't recommend this place to anyone.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: This place has an vibe and setting (I liked the phone chargers on the tables) and the service is excellent. I had the best spare ribs I’ve ever had in my life.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Great spare ribs and good portions of side dishes.  Very nice and polite waitresses.  Good price for good food.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Very average. Meat from average quality. If I pay 30 euro then I want a good steak!

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Very nice food and not too high prices. Service is a bit slow to start at busy times but food arrived promptly with no complaints.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Starters and side dishes were very good. Expensive. Steak was just horrible quality meat.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Good steak.. Good service.. Good wifi

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: Terrible hamburger , stale bread, high price and barely any fries.  Service is fine.

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: These potatoes was awfull.. chicken was so salty and fatty...only salad was good but very little...and all these were a genius offer.. omg...better eat weed !

Review Text: Excellent quality meat, yet very decent prices. Friendly staff, too.

Name: Maximus Steak House

Name: Maximus Steak House
Review Text: I tried the rumpsteak 400 gm and it was really nice and juicy! Definitely love this place.
